Package net.sourceforge.metrics.core.sources

The classes in this package form wrappers around the IJavaElement hierarchy adding storage room for metrics and collaborations with the calculation, persistence and export frameworks.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
GraphContributor  
 

Class Summary
AbstractMetricSource Base class for all metric sources.
Cache public API to the private prevalent Store.
CompilationUnitMetrics Calculates metrics for an ICompilationUnit
Dispatcher Based on the current selection figure out what metric source to create and instruct to calculate metrics, or simply pick up from the cache and use it.
MethodMetrics Collect the results of all Method calculators for each method
PackageFragmentMetrics initialize package fragment metrics (my children) and collect all results from the calculators for the package level
PackageFragmentRootMetrics initialize package fragment metrics (my children) and collect all results from the calculators for the package root level
ProjectMetrics initialize package fragment root metrics (my children) and collect all results from the calculators for the project root level
TypeMetrics Collect the result of all type calculators and setup the method sources
 

Package net.sourceforge.metrics.core.sources Description

The classes in this package form wrappers around the IJavaElement hierarchy adding storage room for metrics and collaborations with the calculation, persistence and export frameworks.
